channel.title: German grammar on Monoglot Anxiety
channel.description: Recent content in German grammar on Monoglot Anxiety

item.title: Fehler Files: German Dative Plural
item.description: I’m a bit of a language coward. I started learning German on my own, and for the longest time I didn’t speak at all despite developing rather good comprehension. It’s not like I couldn’t have tried, but I didn’t. I was just too scared of embarrassing myself. Eventually, I hired a tutor to get some speech practice, and only after that did I finally work up the courage to start practicing with my boyfriend.
